vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the installation of storm drainage improvements and water and wastewater main replacements at seven locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - SYB Construction Co., Inc., lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $13,877,982.60 - Financing: Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($2,057,403.12), 2024B Certificate of Obligation Fund ($7,474,691.88), Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($2,616,107.60) and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($1,729,780.00)
vote.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the installation of storm drainage improvements and water and wastewater main replacements at seven locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - SYB Construction Co., Inc., lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $13,877,982.60 - Financing: Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($2,057,403.12), 2024B Certificate of Obligation Fund ($7,474,691.88), Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($2,616,107.60) and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($1,729,780.00)
